prediction.health: You’ll feel energetic and rejuvenated. You will be able to maintain good fitness. Yoga can help you gain good health. Leafy vegetables are required to maintain stamina. Good sleep too would ensure an increase in stamina and energy levels.
prediction.emotions: You will be soft and somber today and your positive attitude will dominate the atmosphere at home.
prediction.profession: Meetings will result in gains for you today. You will have greater confidence and chances for a promotion at work. Those who are awaiting the results of a job interview would get a favorable result today. This is the perfect time to apply for a loan.
prediction.luck: You may be surprised what today has in store for you as you meet some new and interesting people who will make a mark on your life.
prediction.personal_life: Today, you will meet a close and dear person. This might be the best day to introduce the family to your beloved. You will enjoy complete support of your friends and associates. Your love and care for the elders of the family will keep them happy.
prediction.travel: A long romantic drive with your beloved will make you happy and energetic today.

prediction.health: You are going to enjoy the best of health and a completely stress free day today.
prediction.emotions: You are feeling rather good and it seems that you can place the pulse of success easily. You will be profusely passionate about things today.

prediction.luck: Decode the implications of your imagination. It will bring luck and happiness.
prediction.personal_life: Today is a favorable day for you. Romance is in the air, and if you are single, you are likely to have a thoroughly enjoyable time with your new-found love. Some of you will meet an old time friend and revive fond memories.
prediction.travel: You may travel today to different city. You may meet an old friend and together you may have nostalgic memories.

prediction.health: A positive frame of mind will also help you keep diseases away. Take care to stay away from dust. Take all care while working, as you are susceptible to injuries today. Be on guard against minor injuries and ailments.
prediction.emotions: Today you may experience some moments of mental agony. Don't pity yourself; instead try to control your emotions through self-confidence and determination.
prediction.profession: There are chances of facing obstacles in your work. You may meet someone who will provide useful career advice. Consider everything carefully before you finalize anything. Controlling expenses could be a challenge for you today.
prediction.luck: Beware of being overly generous or depending too much on Lady Luck. Your own efforts will give decent results.
prediction.personal_life: You may be tempted to have a wild flirtation or to act in a rather reckless manner in a relationship. Today is a suitable day for accessing your faults and short-comings. Do not get involved in a dispute or fight.
prediction.travel: Avoid going to high places as there is a risk of falling down.

prediction.health: You are going to feel very energetic today. This is a suitable day to schedule outdoor activities. You will be at the best of your physical shape. Group activities will benefit you.
prediction.emotions: You will be positive and optimistic. You shall feel warm connecting with a friend or a group today.
prediction.profession: You will have chances for gaining some unexpected monetary income. Use your specialized knowledge to augment your career prospects. Your good organizational aptitude and cool mental processes will help you to get things done successfully.
prediction.luck: You may get some good news today which will make you happy. Lady Luck will be smiling at your efforts.
prediction.personal_life: You are going to feel very energetic today. This is a suitable day to schedule outdoor activities. You will be at the best of your physical shape. Group activities will benefit you.
prediction.travel: You may plan a vacation with your family or friends. The trip is likely to make you feel more energetic and full of life.

prediction.health: Constant sitting in one place may bring you pain in neck and back. Your mind will be stressed too. Meditation can help you deal with this.
prediction.emotions: You will be very short-tempered today. It is advisable that you engage in some vigorous swimming or any sort of physical activity.
prediction.profession: Today is not a very favorable day- so check your financial situation and limit your expenses. You may find yourself running from pillar to post with little fruitful outcome. Do not lose heart. Do not give in to temper.
prediction.luck: Luck is not in your favor today. Things just don’t seem to be working in your favour. Be patient and wait for the right time to come.
prediction.personal_life: You can hurt someone else under an impulse of anger. Don’t be in a rush to take decisions. Differences with siblings will upset you. Avoid using harsh words and try to maintain peace in relationships.
prediction.travel: You may face troubles while making short trips. Chances of getting injured or getting involving in disputes are likely. Travel only if you have to.

prediction.health: Health shall remain average. There will be no serious physical ailment. However, don’t ignore any health related issues today.
prediction.emotions: Peace and harmony shall prevail. Keep away from unnecessary arguments and stress.
prediction.profession: Progress in work will be normal. You shall achieve success in proportion to the efforts put in. avoid taking important long term decisions relating to career and finance. Remarks by colleague or boss can create mental stress.
prediction.luck: You shall enjoy average luck today. Don’t try to push too hard.
prediction.personal_life: You will succeed in impressing your beloved. You shall be happy and satisfied in your personal life. You shall share a loving relation with your children. You will enjoy the company of good friends.
prediction.travel: Avoid travelling today, unless absolutely necessary.

prediction.health: You are likely to be at the peak of your health today. You will have great energy and stamina today. You, however, shall be vulnerable to disorders of the head and throat. Avoid all carbonated drinks and refrain from smoking.
prediction.emotions: Today you need to refine your emotional intelligence and work on your dreams. Be the change you want to see in the world.
prediction.profession: Job environment will continue to be good. This is a positive period at work. You will get positive feedback from your seniors and bosses. You will find new enthusiasm in work and are likely to receive active support from your colleagues in office.
prediction.luck: Even though your luck quotient is good today, be modest and don't exceed your abilities. Be humble.
prediction.personal_life: You will be full of passionate feelings towards your partner. Some of you may start a new relationship. Any differences with family members will be resolved today. You may receive good news from maternal relatives.
prediction.travel: Some of you will get an opportunity to go on an adventurous and invigorating trip.

prediction.health: There are no major health related issues that may bother you today. Health will stay fine if you keep yourself away  from useless tensions. A changed lifestyle will be a step towards better health and quality of life.
prediction.emotions: You will feel emotionally balanced and happy today. Your positive attitude will make matters easier for you and others.
prediction.profession: People will look up to you for advice and guidance. Success is definitely yours- if you make crucial changes one step at a time.  Your financial condition is likely to improve soon, so do not wait for others and take your own initiative for any task.
prediction.luck: Some good news, for which you might be waiting eagerly for a long time, may arrive.
prediction.personal_life: The day is yours and you will succeed in whatever you will do. The misunderstandings between you and your partner will be solved and you will be able to enjoy your conjugal life. A family friend will prove to be of help to you.
prediction.travel: You may get to travel new and unexplored places. This trip can be for pleasure or business, but it will be a successful one.

prediction.health: You are going to feel full of life today. You will have good immunity power. This is the most suitable day to schedule outdoor activities. Efforts to change lifestyle bring positive results. Drinking lots of water will be good for your health.
prediction.emotions: Feelings of contentment and a generally good mood help you to deal with changes easily. Today is an excellent day for all kinds of activities.

prediction.health: You may suffer from stomach disorders but medication at the right time would be really helpful for you. Delayed diagnosis may prove harmful to you. Regular walks will definitely help you to increase your immunity.

prediction.personal_life: You will find it difficult to please your family members. Try to understand and look the things from their perspective. Domestic affairs will blur your mind. Health of a child or an elder family member might be a cause for tension.

prediction.health: You have to take special precaution regarding drinking fluids because the chances of a waterborne disease are high. Ensure that you drink boiled and clean water.
prediction.emotions: Be careful not to make harsh comments in case you are pushed into an argument. You need to keep your emotions under control. Don’t let anyone take undue advantage of you
prediction.profession: Sudden issues and problems can upset you. Resist associating with people that will harm your reputation. Situations of stress shall prevail; however, you can overcome it with your patience.
prediction.luck: This time is not in your favor; so, do not depend on luck. But continue with your efforts for which you will get results later.
prediction.personal_life: You may have to face misunderstanding with friends and relatives. An innocent distortion of facts could lead to distrust and hurt in a personal relationship. Adopt an attitude of working "with the flow" for best results.

prediction.health: Anxiety could be the cause of some health related problems today. Make sure that you get complete rest and relaxation.
prediction.emotions: Negative emotions which have been brewing since quite some time shall surface today. You will become more sensitive in your approach and get hurt easily.

prediction.luck: Today is one of your terrible days; nothing will seem to work right. Luck is not in your favor.
prediction.personal_life: You will be highly sensitive to remarks made by your spouse/beloved and may react negatively. Try to bridge the gap before it’s too late. Domestic affairs will disturb your mind.
